projects.title: Deep Learning for Medical Imaging
projects.description: Developing CNN-based models for automated disease detection from chest X-rays
projects.objective: Build a production-ready CNN model achieving >95% accuracy on chest X-ray pathology detection suitable for clinical deployment
keyQuestions: Which architecture performs best on limited medical imaging data?
How to handle class imbalance in rare disease detection?
What data augmentation strategies preserve clinical validity?
projects.currentBlocker: Need IRB approval for additional hospital dataset access (submitted 2 weeks ago)
projects.lastDecision: Switched from ResNet-50 to EfficientNet-B4 based on ablation study results - 3% accuracy improvement with 40% fewer parameters
projects.nextAction: Complete ablation study on data augmentation methods (targeted completion: Jan 30)

projects.title: Natural Language Processing for Legal Documents
projects.description: Building transformer-based NLP pipeline for automated contract analysis and legal risk assessment
projects.objective: Develop a fine-tuned transformer model that extracts key clauses and identifies legal risks in contracts with >90% precision
keyQuestions: Can we effectively fine-tune BERT on legal domain with limited labeled data?
How to handle multi-page context windows beyond 512 tokens?
What evaluation metrics align with legal practitioner needs?
projects.currentBlocker: Waiting for legal domain expert consultation on annotation guidelines (scheduled for Jan 25)
projects.lastDecision: Will use LegalBERT as base model instead of generic BERT after literature review showed 15% F1 improvement
projects.nextAction: Annotate 100 sample contracts for initial training set using agreed guidelines
